title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.25 - Shaving brushes, mugs and finger bowls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.25 - Shaving brushes, mugs and finger bowls

State Regulations

The use of shaving brushes and shaving mugs is prohibited. The use of finger bowls is prohibited unless a separate sanitary inner paper liner or cup is used for each customer and discarded immediately after use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
10.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
